text: al'aerab sukkan albadiat 'ashadu kfrana wnfaqana min 'ahl alhadrt, wdhlk ljfayhm wqswt qulubuhum wbuedhm ean aleilm walelma', wamajalis alwez waldhkr, fahum ldhlk 'ahaqu bi'ana la yaelamuu hudud aldyn, wama 'anzal allah min alshraye walahkam. wallah ealim bihal hwla' jmyeana, hakim fi tdbyrh lamwr ebadh
